respLineColor.description: The colour of the response bar

reproStim.description: The radius of the reproduction stim circle in dva

rightPos.description: Position of the left response area and text in dva wrt the center at [0,0]

buttonOpac.description: Opacity of the left and right response buttons when hovered over

buttonColour.description: colour of the lines surrounding the response button areas when hovered

fixSize.description: Horizontal offset of the grating relative to fixation, prev 0.75

textHeight.description: The height of letters, in degrees of visual angle.

textWidth.description: The width of one line of text, after which the new line starts.

textPosition.description: The x and y coordinates where the text should be presented, in degrees of visual angle.

stimOn.description: The period during which the stimulus is on, in seconds

stimOff.description: The period during which the stimulus is off, in seconds

responseDelay.description: The period during which participants cannot make a response, in seconds

responseDeadline.description: The period during which participants can respond, in seconds.

feedbackDuration.description: The period during which response feedback is presented, in seconds.

fixationDuration.description: The period during which only fixation is presented, in seconds.

valueRef.description: The value of the reference stimulus, in pi radians

valueDiff.description: The difference between the low and high value stimulus, in pi radians

thetaVars.description: The standard deviation of the low and high risk stimuli, in pi radians
